Html:
Hello,

I am trying to use the SimulateTextEntry to simulate characters like ä,ü,ß without any luck. The output always comes as ? instead of the correct character. I tried to changed the code and used
var chars = Encoding.GetEncoding(437).GetBytes(text);
Though I get the correct ASCII code but output does not come.

Any help in this regard will be appreciated.

Regards
Avik Sen

Hello, I had the same problem.
I decided that when changed the code and used
var chars = text.ToCharArray();
